jobs.title: backend developer
jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced Backend Developer to join our team. As a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining the server-side logic, database integration, and API connectivity of our applications. You will work collaboratively with our development team to identify and prioritize project requirements, and deliver high-quality solutions that meet our business needs. If you have a passion for building scalable, efficient, and reliable backend systems, and are looking for a new challenge, we want to hear from you.
jobs.must_have_skills: Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or C#, Experience with database management systems such as MySQL or MongoDB, Knowledge of API design principles and RESTful APIs, Understanding of cloud-based platforms such as AWS or Azure, Familiarity with agile development methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban, Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or C#, Knowledge of message queues such as RabbitMQ or Apache Kafka
jobs.good_to_have_skills: Experience with containerization using Docker, Knowledge of message queues such as RabbitMQ or Apache Kafka, Familiarity with testing frameworks such as JUnit or PyUnit

must_have: Proficiency in programming languages such as Java
Experience with database management systems such as MySQL or MongoDB
Knowledge of API design principles and RESTful APIs
Understanding of cloud-based platforms such as AWS or Azure
Familiarity with agile development methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban
Proficiency in programming languages such as Java
Knowledge of message queues such as RabbitMQ or Apache Kafka
good_to_have: Knowledge of message queues such as RabbitMQ or Apache Kafka
Familiarity with testing frameworks such as JUnit or PyUnit

jobs.ai_generated_message:
🚀 Now Hiring: backend developer

📍 Location: Bengaluru
🎯 Openings: 5

We are seeking an experienced Backend Developer to join our team. As a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining the server-side logic, database integration, and API connectivity of our applications. You will work collaboratively with our development team to identify and prioritize project requirements, and deliver high-quality solutions that meet our business needs. If you have a passion for building scalable, efficient, and reliable backend systems, and are looking for a new challenge, we want to hear from you.

✅ Must-Have Skills:
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Java
  • Python
  • or C#
  • Experience with database management systems such as MySQL or MongoDB
  • Knowledge of API design principles and RESTful APIs

💡 Nice-to-Have Skills:
  • Experience with containerization using Docker
  • Knowledge of message queues such as RabbitMQ or Apache Kafka
  • Familiarity with testing frameworks such as JUnit or PyUnit

🔗 Apply Now via the link below!

jobs.title: frontend developer
jobs.description: We are seeking a highly skilled Frontend Developer to join our team, working remotely to design and develop innovative, user-friendly, and responsive web applications. As a key member of our development team, you will be responsible for translating business requirements into technical solutions, collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements, and ensuring the highest quality of deliverables. If you have a passion for creating exceptional user experiences, are proficient in the latest frontend technologies, and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
jobs.must_have_skills: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and CSS preprocessors such as Sass or Less, Experience with modern frontend frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js, Strong understanding of responsive web design, CSS grids, and flexbox, Familiarity with version control systems, particularly Git, Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to debug and optimize code
jobs.good_to_have_skills: Experience with state management libraries such as Redux or MobX, Knowledge of web performance optimization techniques and tools, Familiarity with agile development methodologies and project management tools such as Jira or Asana

must_have: and CSS preprocessors such as Sass or Less
Experience with modern frontend frameworks such as React
Strong understanding of responsive web design
with the ability to debug and optimize code
good_to_have: Experience with state management libraries such as Redux or MobX
Knowledge of web performance optimization techniques and tools
Familiarity with agile development methodologies and project management tools such as Jira or Asana

jobs.ai_generated_message:
